name: Dune Ravage
description:
made by real_Orihs as part of the Game Design and Developement with Unity course from Michigan state University

List of changes:
Added controls page on the main menu explaining key-binding for keyboard

Added "Run" feature, enabled by holding L.Shift or R.Shift
Added moving platforms to level 1

Added deadly spikes instantly killing the player to level 1
Added 2 new pickups, upgraded pistol and triple jump above the spikes

Each level's pause menu now contains instructions of what needs to be done

P.S. Please use the windows/mac version
